what is "modprobe ndiswrapper" supposed to do?
loads the module into the kernel
you try   ifup wlan0  yet?
after you have loaded ndiswrapper, you have to make it permanent, otherwise you need to reload at next boot
ifup wlan0 w/ it plugged in right...
what happened?
